## PRIMARY

```{r primarycutpoints, message=F,warning=F}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(cutpointr)
load("./primary_score_fr.RDA")
#library(patchwork)


# start looking at cutpoints
prior_cut <- cutpointr(primary_score_fr,log_prior_odds,present,metric=accuracy)
mutect_cut <- cutpointr(primary_score_fr,log_mutect_odds,present,metric=accuracy)
summary(prior_cut)
plot(prior_cut)
summary(mutect_cut)
plot(mutect_cut)
```

## RELAPSE

```{r relapsecutpoints, message=F,warning=F}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(cutpointr)
load("./relapse_score_fr.RDA")
#library(patchwork)


# start looking at cutpoints
prior_cut <- cutpointr(relapse_score_fr,log_prior_odds,present,metric=F1_score)
mutect_cut <- cutpointr(relapse_score_fr,log_mutect_odds,present,metric=F1_score)
summary(prior_cut)
plot(prior_cut)
summary(mutect_cut)
plot(mutect_cut)
```
